author: bfoster
msg: Made changes to Ingester and to ProductCrawler's usage of Ingesters

- ProductCrawler now can accept any Ingester which controls how communication with a back end database is controlled.  Currently there are now two Ingesters: StdIngester and CacheIngester.  CacheIngester still communicates with the file manager in the same way as StdIngester however it keeps a local cache of ingested files so that queries to the file manager are limited.

author: bfoster
msg: Merged IngestCrawler.java from Push-Pull-Framework into cas-crawler MetExtractorProductCrawler.java
- also required modifications to cas-filemgr and cas-metadata
- working code. . .however more debugging is still required
